title: Lipstick

adjectives: Of, relating to, or denoting the sex which is generally characterized as the one associated with the larger gametes (for species which have two sexes and for which this distinction can be made).
Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces fertilizable gametes (ova) from which offspring develop
Belonging to the sex with larger, fertilizable gametes.

Belonging to the sex which typically produces eggs, which in humans and most other mammals is typically the one which has XX chromosomes; belonging to the sex which has larger gametes (for species which have two sexes and for which this distinction can be made).
nouns: A woman is a female human.
Female adult human
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female human.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
Adult female human being.
A preparation, such as powder or a skin cream, designed to beautify the body by direct application.
A toiletry designed to beautify the body
Popular trends.
Fashion refers to styles of dress that are popular in a culture at any given time.
The latest and most admired style in clothes and cosmetics and behavior
Term for a popular style or practice in clothing, make-up, furniture, etc.
The latest and most admired style in clothes and cosmetics and behavior.
Fashion is a popular style or practice, especially in clothing, footwear, accessories, makeup, body piercing, or furniture.
A prevailing mode of expression, e.g., clothing
Young female human
A young female human; (in contrast to boy), a female child or young adult.
A title of respect for a young woman (usually unmarried) with or without a name used.
A young female person, usually a child or teenager.
A young woman
A young girl.
A girl is any female human from birth through childhood and adolescence to attainment of adulthood when she becomes a woman.
A girl is a female human from birth through childhood and adolescence to attainment of adulthood when she becomes a woman.
A young female; miss.
Lipstick is a cosmetic product containing pigments, oils, waxes, and emollients that apply color, texture, and protection to the lips.
Makeup for the lips.
Make-up for the lips.
Makeup that is used to color the lips
Makeup that is used to color the lips.
A cosmetic product

description: Lipstick shown with the lid removed. Displays in a shade of red on most platforms, except WhatsApp and Twitter which have a more a pinkish color.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's lipstick emoji presents a sleek, metallic tube with a rich, deep crimson lipstick bullet peeking out, reflecting light with a glossy sheen characteristic of Apple's 3D design. The smooth gradients and polished finish give it a luxurious and sophisticated feel, emphasizing its cosmetic nature. On Apple devices, this emoji is a vibrant symbol of beauty, makeup, and personal style, frequently used in discussions about fashion, getting ready, or expressing a bold and glamorous sentiment.
